Title: Provides for the determination of legal regulated base date rent for certain purposes
Summary: Provides that the determination of legal regulated base date rent at the four-year lookback shall be determined by either the survey sampling method or the default method if there is fraud.
LawCode: Amd ยง12, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 576 of the laws of 1974, constituting the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to providing for the determination of legal regulated base date rent for certain purposes
